info.task: navigate forwards to a mixed checkbox
info.title: Navigate forwards to a mixed checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
